code: export let ToolMode=/*#__PURE__*/function(ToolMode){ToolMode["LABELING"]="LABELING";ToolMode["REWORK"]="REWORK";ToolMode["QA_RO"]="QA_RO";ToolMode["QA_RW"]="QA_RW";ToolMode["AUDIT"]="AUDIT";ToolMode["AUDIT_RW"]="AUDIT_RW";ToolMode["PREVIEW"]="PREVIEW";ToolMode["TEMPLATE_PREVIEW"]="TEMPLATE_PREVIEW";return ToolMode;}({});export function isLabel(mode){return mode===ToolMode.LABELING||mode===ToolMode.REWORK;}export function isQA(mode){return mode===ToolMode.QA_RO||mode===ToolMode.QA_RW;}export function isReviewEditable(mode){return isQA(mode)||mode===ToolMode.AUDIT;}export function isAnnotationReadonly(mode){return mode===ToolMode.QA_RO||mode===ToolMode.AUDIT||mode===ToolMode.PREVIEW;}export function isRework(mode){return mode===ToolMode.REWORK;}export function isPreview(mode){return mode===ToolMode.PREVIEW;}export function isTemplatePreview(mode){return mode===ToolMode.TEMPLATE_PREVIEW;}
